name: Single filer at Social Security wage base boundary
description: Single person earning exactly $176,100 - tests Social Security wage cap

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 IRS tax tables - tests wage base cap exactly
sources.notes: Testing that Social Security is capped at exactly $176,100. SS: $176,100 * 6.2% = $10,918.20. Medicare: $176,100 * 1.45% = $2,553.45. No additional Medicare (under $200k)
